overview: Ryan co-founded GrandBanks Capital in 2000 with Charley Lax and focuses on investments in each area of focus in the GrandBanks Capital portfolio. Ryan currently serves on the Board of Directors of GlassHouse Technologies, First Coverage, Vela Systems, Vivox, Inc, SendMe Mobile, I Love Rewards, Nexage and VillageVines. Ryan managed and served on the board of GrandBanks’ investment Enpocket which was sold to Nokia Corporation in October 2007 as well as WHERE, which was acquired by eBay in April 2011. Ryan also served as the lead investor in the Series A funding of First Coverage, Vela Systems, and Vivox.
